comments.en:
Apollo is a subsidiary of HP, selling HP designs in a new casing.

This is a special design to make small girls wasting lots of ink. A case with pink parts and flowers on it fitting nicely to the "Barbie" dolls. In addition a Windows toy program to design the hair of "Barbie" dolls comes with the printer.

This printer probably works best with one of the various deskjet drivers; try all the "cdj..." ones, "gimp-print"/"stp", "pcl3"/"hpdj", etc.

Consumables/Refills: Two HP cartridges
